lead_paragraph: SHEIB--Marc B.,70, Devoted father to Brett (Courtnei) Bart (Sabrina) and Charlsey. Adored grandpa, caring brother. He was greatly loved by his family and will be missed forever. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHEIB, MARC B.
